$:/plugins/TWaddle/HackSearch/readme.text:
~HackSearch appears as a tab in the $:/AdvancedSearch tiddler.

It is a tool for TW hackers to more quickly find the components that TW consists of.

The ~HackSearch "subtabs" are arbitrary both in number and design, so do bring up ideas for improvement in the [[discussion group|https://groups.google.com/g/tiddlywiki]].

Add your own "subtabs" by tagging tiddlers with `$:/HackTab`. If you want a short and snappy tab name, then add a `caption` field for it.
$:/plugins/TWaddle/HackSearch/readme.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/HackSearch/readme

$:/plugins/HackSearch/Buttons.text:
Checkbox for visibility and Drag to reorder.
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/plugins/HackSearch/Buttons/]!has[draft.of]] -$:/plugins/HackSearch/Buttons/ItemTemplate" default="$:/plugins/HackSearch/Buttons/ViewToolbar" class="tc-vertical" explicitState="$:/state/tabs/controlpanel/toolbars-1345989671"/>
$:/plugins/HackSearch/Buttons.title: $:/plugins/HackSearch/Buttons
$:/plugins/HackSearch/Buttons.caption: Buttons

$:/plugins/HackSearch/ControlPanel.text:
\define rec(tid) <$vars tag={{{ [[$tid$]removeprefix[$:/core/ui]addprefix[$:/tags]] }}} > <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]]""" variable=curr>
<$link to=<>> <$transclude tiddler=<> field=caption> <$view tiddler=<> field=title/> <$macrocall $name=rec tid=<>/>
\end ''The [[$:/ControlPanel]] tab structure.''
The [[plugins|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Plugins]] tab is omitted because its subtabs are //not// tagged with its parents name.
The [[Keyboard Shortcuts|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]] tab is omitted because it has no subtabs.
<$list filter="""[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/ControlPanel]] -$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Plugins -$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts -$:/plugins/ahahn/tinka/controlPanelExtension""">
<$link to=<> > <$transclude tiddler=<> field=caption> <$view tiddler=<> field=title/> <$macrocall $name=rec tid=<>/>
$:/plugins/HackSearch/ControlPanel.title: $:/plugins/HackSearch/ControlPanel
$:/plugins/HackSearch/ControlPanel.caption: CtrlPanel

$:/plugins/HackSearch/Overwrites.text:
\define has-overwrite() <$list filter="""[plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]first[]]"""> {{$:/core/images/star-filled||$:/plugins/HackSearch/Template/IconTemplate}} \end \define list-shadows()
<$list filter="[plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]]"> <$link/> {{$:/core/images/star-filled||$:/plugins/HackSearch/Template/IconTemplate}}
<$list filter="[plugintiddlers[]!is[tiddler]]"> <$link/>
\end {{$:/core/images/star-filled||$:/plugins/HackSearch/Template/IconTemplate}} = has overwritten shadow tiddlers <$list filter="[plugin-type[plugin]sort[]] -$:/core +[reverse[]] $:/core +[reverse[]]"> <$vars state={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]addprefix[$:/state/systemics/reveal/plugin/]] }}}> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="show"> <$button set=<> setTo="show" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-right}} <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show"> <$button set=<> setTo="hide" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} <$link/> <> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show"> <>
$:/plugins/HackSearch/Overwrites.title: $:/plugins/HackSearch/Overwrites
$:/plugins/HackSearch/Overwrites.caption: Overwrites

Tiddlers tagged $:/tags/ViewTemplate Drag to rearrange: <$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" itemTemplate="$:/plugins/HackSearch/Templates/Template"/> !!!Details for some viewtemplates @@.bp-table | Field | ~ViewTemplate tiddlers |h |icon, title|$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title
[class: ''tc-tiddler-title''
  [class: ''tc-titlebar''
    [class: ''tc-tiddler-controls''
      add by tag: <>
    ]
    [class: ''tc-tiddler-title-icon''
        !!icon
    ]
    [''h2'' class: ''tc-title''
        !!title
    ]
  ]
]| |modifier, modified|$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle
[class: ''tc-subtitle''
  !!modifier
  !!modified via $:/language/Tiddler/DateFormat
]| |tags|$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags
[class: ''tc-tags-wrapper''
  !!tags via $:/core/ui/TagTemplate
]| |text|$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body
[class: ''tc-tiddler-body''
  !!text
]| @@

$:/plugins/HackSearch/SystemTags.text:
''Favourite system tags'' <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/HackSearch/SystemTags/favs" text="show"> <$button set="$:/state/HackSearch/SystemTags/favs" setTo="show">edit <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/HackSearch/SystemTags/favs" text="show"> <$button set="$:/state/HackSearch/SystemTags/favs" setTo="hide">edit <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/HackSearch/SystemTags/favs" text="show">
<$edit tiddler="$:/plugins/HackSearch/SystemTags/favs"/> Add ''system'' tag names (i.e normally prefixed `$:/tags/`

Separate groups with `--` ''but'' each separator much have different number of `-` characters. I don't have time to explain why ;-)
<$list filter="[enlist{$:/plugins/HackSearch/SystemTags/favs}addprefix[$:/tags/]]"> <$list filter="[{!!title}suffix[--]]"> <$list filter="[{!!title}!suffix[--]]">
<$view field=title/> <$link/> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{!!caption}}/>
All tags prefixed ~$:/tags/ that are ''//used//'' in this wiki
(For a //complete// list of system tags in TW, see [[docs|https://tiddlywiki.com/#SystemTags]].) <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/HackSearch/SystemTags" text="show"> <$button set="$:/state/HackSearch/SystemTags" setTo="show">Show me <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tags[]prefix[$:/tags/]]">
<$link/> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{!!caption}}/> <$link> {{!!description}}
$:/plugins/HackSearch/SystemTags.title: $:/plugins/HackSearch/SystemTags
